7116.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

8472.quoteText:
The Archive may modify this Agreement from time to time, and your continued use of the Collections and/or the Site constitutes your acceptance of any and all modifications.
The Archive will attempt to notify you of substantial modifications via the email address that you have registered with us, if any.
8472.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

9327.quoteText: If you provide any content to the Archive, you grant the Archive a nonexclusive, royalty-free right to use that content.
9327.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

tosdr.case: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

9328.quoteText:
You agree to abide by all applicable laws and regulations, including intellectual property laws, in connection with your use of the Archive.
In particular, you certify that your use of any part of the Archive's Collections will be limited to noninfringing or fair use under copyright law.
If a Creative Commons or other license has been declared for particular material on the Archive, to the extent you trust the declaration and declarer (which is rarely the Internet Archive), you may use the content according to the terms and conditions of the applicable license.
9328.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit illegal content

9329.quoteText: In addition, we request that, according to standard academic practice, if you use the Archive's Collections for any research that results in an article, a book, or other publication, you list the Archive as a resource in your bibliography.
9329.title: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution

tosdr.case: You are allowed to quote their content with attribution

9330.quoteText: (g) not to harass, threaten, or otherwise annoy anyone
9330.title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

tosdr.case: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

9331.quoteText:
In addition, the Collections are provided to you on an as-is and as-available basis.
You agree that your use of the Site and the Collections is at your sole risk.
9331.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

9332.quoteText: You understand and agree that the Archive makes no warranty or representation regarding the accuracy, currency, completeness, reliability, or usefulness of the content in the Collections, that the Site or the Collections will meet your requirements, that access to the Collections will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error free, or that defects, if any, will be corrected.
9332.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

9333.quoteText: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the Internet Archive and its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, officers, directors, and employees from and against any and all liability, loss, claims, damages, costs, and/or actions (including attorneys’ fees) arising from your use of the Archive’s services, the site, or the Collections.
9333.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

9334.quoteText: You agree that this Agreement is governed by California law and that any suit arising from this Agreement will be brought in San Francisco, California, and you further agree that on the election and reasonable notice of either party any litigation shall be referred to arbitration pursuant to the California Code of Civil Procedure, §§1280 et seq.
9334.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

tosdr.case: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

9338.quoteText: The Archive may use "cookies" to track Users' activities on the Site and in the Collections.
9338.title: This service requires first-party cookies

9339.quoteText: The Internet Archive may, in appropriate circumstances and at its discretion, remove certain content or disable access to content that appears to infringe the copyright or other intellectual property rights of others.
9339.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

9340.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
tosdr.tldr: The signup page (https://archive.org/account/signup) allows you to enter a "screen name" and it anotates: "(this is how others will see you) 3 to 127 characters"

9341.quoteText: The Archive may collect personally identifying information when a Researcher registers for access to the Collections, including the Researcher’s name, address, telephone number, and email address, and the Researcher’s proposal for using the Collections.
9341.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

9342.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time
tosdr.tldr: A marked-by-date archive of the ToS page can be easily viewed without previous registration on "https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://archive.org/about/terms.php"

9343.quoteText: Please contact us with any comments or questions at info@archive.org.
9343.title: The service provides a free help desk

tosdr.case: The service provides a free help desk
